DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , non-interventional , continuous submission safety study include patient plan Gadolinium ( Gd ) contrast enhance Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( MRI ) accordance approve label . The investigator make choice Gd enhance MRI ( decision use Gadovist accord Japanese Package Insert prior enrol patient study ) . The study period 3 year . Data analysis period 1 year . In total , 3300 patient recruit . For patient , data collect defined case report form ( CRF ) visit MRI examination ( per investigator routine practice ) .
